SELECT * FROM EMPLOYEE
SELECT * FROM EMPLOYEE WHERE 1=1 AND (EMPLOYEE_ID = #{employeeInfo} OR EMPLOYEE_NAME = #{employeeInfo})
INSERT INTO employee (employee_id, employee_name) VALUES (#{employeeId}, #{employeeName})
